name: Shubham

services.title: Responsive Web Design
services.description: I create mobile-responsive websites that look great on all devices.

services.title: Single Page Application (SPA) Development
services.description: I build fast and efficient Single Page Applications using React.js.

services.title: Front-End Performance Optimization
services.description: I optimize website performance to ensure fast load times and scalability.

services.title: Custom Animations and Interactivity
services.description: I develop engaging animations and interactive components to enhance user experience.

aboutpara: I am Shubham Kumar, a passionate front-end developer pursuing a B.Tech in Information Technology at Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology. Proficient in C++, C, Java, and JavaScript, I excel with modern web technologies like NodeJS, React.js, MongoDB, and MySQL. At CROPC, I led a front-end redesign, enhancing performance and user experience. During my internship at EaseMyRoom, I developed responsive interfaces. My projects, such as CineCenter, Bubble Shop, and Wearify, showcase my skills in creating engaging web platforms. My role as a UI/UX Designer at GDSC reflects my dedication to intuitive design. I am keen to learn new technologies and tackle challenging projects.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to most of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.position: Frontend Engineer at Climate Resilient Observing Systems Promotion Council (CROPC)

education.universityName: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology (GTBIT) (Affiliated to GGSIPU), India
